name: High Dimension
description:
High Dimension is a roguelike where you explore in search of the High Dimension event puzzle involving science and magic.

Take on the role of Leinad an intelligent medieval nobleman or Carol a strong vassal who doesn't bow to anyone, explore environments in pixel art procedural.

It takes place in such a distant realm. There was an event called High Dimension that mixed our dimensions in relation to time and space. The king set two young men to find out what was going on. The world is upside down, always forming new realities, your mission is to discover the cause of all this. Upgrade equipment, swords, use items strategically, with action combat.

Main Features


Exploration on a metroidvania platform:
No instructions. No help. No hand holding. Start with nothing explore, learn, perfect your moves and kill enemies.
Pixel Art Visuals:
2D characters.
New randomly generated dimensions:
Want a new dimension? Smoothly! At any time, you can generate a new seed from the living dimensional world that hates you and wants you to die.
